TopicTitle: Destroying KSC with the least amount of effort [Stock]

Articles.Content:
The Challenge is to destroy one building from the KSC (except for the runway/Launchpad) using the least amount of effort (Mass, Cost, Speed).

You have to launch A vessel as cheap, light, and slow as possible, but still capable of destructing a building.

Rules:

-No mods

-You have to destroy anything you want but the launchpad and runway

-No Bugusing (infinity-glider, ladderpropulsion, etc..)

Score:

-Mass:

-<500t 1p.

-<250t 2p.

-<100t 5p.

-<75t 8p.

-<50t 12p.

-<40t 20p.

-<30t 40p.

-<20t 75p.

-<10t 100p.

-<1000m/s 1p.

-<600m/s 3p.

-<200m/s 9p.

-<180m/s 17p.

-<150m/s 26p.

-<60m/s 90p.

-<45m/s 110p.

Cost:

-<500000 1p.

-<300000 2p.

-<90000 5p.

-<35000 25p.

-<20000 40p.

-<6000 100p.

-<4500 200p.

-<3000 1000p.

- Any Kerbal dying in the process scores 10p.

----------------------------------------------------------------

Of course it's impossible to gain all points in every category but a good strategy is to focus on one major category.. Have fun!
